content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.#TempTable
    (
     [doc] nvarchar(4000) 
    )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.#TempTable ([Value])
 
	FROM 'https://nithindatalakestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/salesforce/jsonfiles/cdc_stream_12_21_22__06.json'
	WITH (
      
		FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
		,fieldterminator ='0x0b'
        ,fieldquote = '0x0b'
        ,rowterminator = '\n'  /* Override This if a Json document and not single object */
		,CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Managed Identity')
        
	)


    select * from  dbo.#TempTable
